text:
I'm live again in two and half hours! Working on the new ConstraintSolver.jl release which supports `&&` and `||` constraints inside indicator and reified.
Will be my first stream for a while so I'm more than happy to answer general ConstraintSolver.jl questions as well. See you on twitch:
In your time zone: <https://www.starts-at.com/event/2003875585>

attachments.title: See the event start time
attachments.text: See when the event starts in your local timezone.
